name: Exorbitary
description:
Controls:

WASD to move the Viewport (you can also move your mouse to the edge of the screen tho)

Click on a Planet and drag the mouse to shoot an spaceship in the direction you dragged. Try to hit the other Planets and conquer the whole galaxy!

(Btw. you are the blue fraction)

-------------------------------------------------

Hey there :)

this is my first game uploaded (guess it's not the first one I made tho) made for the Blackthornprod Gamejam 2. I would have loved if I would have had a little bit more time for this Jam tho my time schedule was kinda... thight? So I made this game in around 12 hours, where I left out a little bit sleep and yeah ^-^

Was kinda fun to make this - but I'm not an artist. Please don't suffer eye Pain or depression when playing this xD

Well - I guess that's it. Please leave a comment with things you like and do not like in this game. 

Have a nice Day, Qbams aka Mike.
